name: Among Waifus
description:
Embark on an interstellar journey on your starship 'Atlas'. Help your crew arrive safely and complete the assembly on the new base in Demeter-2 - an icy planet full of minerals and natural resources.
Or at least that was your designed mission, doesn't mean you gotta obey them, after all you are months in space away from civilization and law, nothing can stop you from having some fun with your crew full of waifus.


Features:

- Perform tasks to get the ship up and running.

- Help your crewmates to improve your relations with them.

- Make your crew depend on you, and soon even the ship's captain will be under your influence.
